question: What are the signs of a munafiq, faasiq and faajir. Can you also tell me whether it is correct to define a faasiq as immoral. Jazakallah khairan
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) said, 'The signs of a Munaafiq are
three; When he speaks, he lies; When he disputes, he is vulgar; and When he
makes a promise, he breaks it.' (Mishkaat)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
